1.name: Song Recommendation
1.info: Weekly Song Recommendation program that runs a JavaScript job. Utilizes Back4App to run a cloud job weekly. Currently random selections from a YouTube playlist.

2.name: Chat Rooms
2.info: Chat Rooms utilizing socket.io to chat with other visitors on my site.

3.name: Handwritten Number Detector
3.info: Application utilizing a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for handwritten digit classification. Draw a number in the canvas and it will be sent to a running EC2 instance to guess the number drawn.

4.name: BattleShip
4.info: Rendition of battleship hosted on my site. Multiplayer in progress currently only player vs CPU.
